name: COS - Parallel Community Detection
short_description: Clique percolation method On Steroids (COS) enable k-clique communities to be detected, in parallel, from large-scale networks. Its low memory requirements, together with its linear speedup, make it really efficient, even on dense, highly interconnected networks. COS should be the method of choice for k-clique community detection aiming at very high performance and low resource requirements.
summary: COS is a free, opensource parallel k-clique community detection method
